meanings.definition: The state or quality of being ungrateful.
meanings.sent1: Her ungratefulnesses towards her parents hurt their feelings.
meanings.sent2: His ungratefulnesses for all the help he received was disappointing.
meanings.sent3: The ungratefulnesses of the spoiled child was evident when she didn't say thank you.
meanings.sent4: The ungratefulnesses of the student towards his teacher was like a dark cloud over the classroom.
meanings.sent5: The ungratefulnesses of the guest left a bitter taste in the host's mouth.
